about_the_game:
Medieval Questionnaire is an educational game that tests your knowledge of medieval times with true or false questions. Enjoy relaxing music as you answer real questions and delve into the world of knights and castles. Challenge yourself and learn about this captivating era in history.

Features:
• Enjoy soothing background music.
• Test your knowledge with engaging true or false questions about the medieval era.
• Track your score and strive to outdo your personal best.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
